These pathogenic agents are altered forms of the bird flu virus known as H5N1.
H5N1 is widespread in poultry in parts of Asia and the Middle East.
It rarely infects people.

Public health experts worry that the virus might mutate, begin spreading from person to person, and start a pandemic.
